description:
Kaoru`s girlfriend from the past. Growing up sheltered without any friends she found a genuine connection with Kaoru Mikogami in high school.
[spoiler=""]As a child she was seen as piece of equipment to experiment on by her megalomaniac father Wezmar Diorg. This resulted in a fatal experiment which destroyed her body and left her mind wandering around the computer network where it would later enact it`s revenge in the form of XINN[/spoiler]
name: Mayumi Masato
